Type Alias# Task.Handle

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+

```
typealias Handle = Task
```

Available when `Success` is `Never` and `Failure` is `Never`.Deprecated

Task.Handle has been removed; use Task
